creator: Nunes_
title: Parking Sensor with Bluetooth
description: This project describes the creation of a parking sensor with Bluetooth connectivity. An app is used to show the distance to obstacles close to the sensor.
steps: Connect the sensors to the copper board and link them to the Arduino, defining the input ports for each sensor. Also, connect the Bluetooth module.
Develop the program in the Arduino IDE. Use the provided code, ensuring that the trig and echo pins for the sensors are correctly defined.
Create a mobile application using AppInventor to display the distance to the nearest obstacle based on the sensor data. Use the provided code.

Test the Bluetooth connection by pairing the mobile device with the sensor's Bluetooth module. If paired successfully, the app will display the distance to the nearest obstacle. Mount the sensor on the desired vehicle and use it.
